title: What may be concluded from physics problem start

content.prompt: A physics problem starts: "A solid sphere has charge distributed uniformly throughout. . ." It may be correctly concluded that the

choices.label: electric field is zero everywhere inside the sphere
electric field inside the sphere is the same as the electric field outside
electric potential on the surface of the sphere is not constant
electric potential in the center of the sphere is zero

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
